📊 "Gamification" - 将活动变成游戏化，以提高员工的参与度和满意度。
🎨 "Creative Break" - 给员工提供创意休闲活动，以提高员工的创意和灵活性。
📊 "Employee Feedback" -  Regularly gather employee feedback to understand their needs and concerns.
🎉 "Team Building" - Organize team-building activities to improve communication and collaboration among employees.
📊 "Flexible Work Arrangements" - Offer flexible work arrangements to improve work-life balance and employee satisfaction.
